report 4 spam

Just wanted to clarify whether Riot has fixed the bug where the mana, health, ability bar/ ping bar, item bar, mini map, allied champion photos on the left of the screen have disappeared when tabbed out and come back into the game or at the beginning of a lol match??? 

This is one of the problems I have during my gameplay, in order to fix it I must hover over the places I want to make reappear with my mouse.

Another problem I've encountered has been Thresh and the Relic Shield. When I am playing the supporting role with Thresh I apply relic shield as a starting item, I naturally try to help my ADC by getting last hits on enemy minions but for some reason I am not able to collect the gold when the minion is on the relic's specified health for gold income and health return to the ADC. I must hit the Minion or monster with health below a normal basic Thresh attack. 

If these issues could be resolved that would be wonderful.

Thank you, 

 SCOREGASM{{champion:412}}
The 'problem' you have with Thresh and Relic Shield is an intentional mechanic as the shield was designed for melee champions...

Thresh is a confused soul (hehe) as he doesn't identify as ranged or melee, the Relic Shield bug/intentional bs or whatever it actually is will probably be here to stay for the foreseeable future as he's still very competitive. Riot almost never removes minor negative bugs and stuff from champs that are  powerful. Same way they let a buff bug sit on an unpopular/underpowered champ for a long time. A prime example was {{champion:12}}'s E,Q + auto attack bug that they got rid of when he became somewhat popular again.
Interesting..

The new hud looks super polished and all, but if they haven't listened to all these people asking to leave the old hud in, and don't act upon the high volume of said requests, it's going to be 2 steps forward, 10 steps backwards in my opinion. I believe riot need to start paying a lot more attention to their respective communities, because a lot of the time, it seems we're 'discussing' things for nothing. No slander intended
